creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: octagonal armorial plate decorated with blue and white arms of Franco, center with fountain tree and floral border with birds, motto 'Sub Pace Copia'
medium: Porcelain with enamel and gilded decoration
text: The coat of arms on this plate are of the Franco family, and was granted to Jacob Franco of London in 1760.
title: Plate
